traits.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny book. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 5 (2d4 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 2 (1d4 damage) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
